text: 8:15-16 Ofa Gami 23:33-43; Godɨn Araziba 16:13-15Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me Jerusalem ko nguibar igharazibar gumazamiziba bagha akam amaga ghaze, “Ia mɨghsɨabar mangɨ olivɨn temebar aghariba ko dar dafariba ko ter guar avɨrir dafarir avɨriba itiba inigh izɨ uari bagh averpenibar ingar. Ia Moses Osirizir Arazibar aven akar kamɨn gɨn mangɨ bizir kabar amu.”
